item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Sprinto Bot (the Service) is a Discord app provided by Pengo Wray (I, We) and is intended for use as is. The Service is provided to users without any guarantees, warranties, or promises of additional support or updates. Users are expected to accept the app as is, with any existing features, limitations, or bugs. If there are issues or desired features, there is no obligation on the part of Pengo Wray to make changes or improvements.

item.title: Terms Of Service
item.description: Terms and Conditions # By using sprintobot.com website (Website), its Discord bot (Service, Services, Bots, App) you are agreeing to the below mentioned Terms and Privacy Policy (Policy). You acknowledge that you have the priviledge to use the Bots freely on any Discord Server (Server) you share with it, that you can invite it to any Server that you have "Manage Server" rights for and that this priviledge might get revoked for you, if you're subject of breaking the terms and/or policy of Bots, or the Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and/or Community Guidelines of Discord Inc.

item.title: Blog
item.description: “For Sprinto blog posts check out patreon.com/pengowray”
